title: Toyota suspends dispatch of three models in India due to 'irregularities' in diesel engine
description: Toyota Industries Corporation (TICO), a company affiliated with Toyota Motor Corporation (TMC), on January 29, 2024, announced that irregularities in horsepower output certification tests were found on three diesel engine models.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
